ygData.subject: Re: Is blacksmithing broke?...Nope
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 09/17/1999 7:27:22 AM Eastern Daylight Time, ... EXCEPT blacksmithing.  Oh well. ... somewhere near there.  I can make all items with  only
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 09/17/1999 7:27:22 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com writes:

> Date: Wed, 15 Sep 1999 13:46:28 -0700
> From: "lost One" <l0st1@...>
> Subject: Is blacksmithing broke?
>
> Everyone notice how last night all the other skills got some changes
EXCEPT blacksmithing. Oh well.
>
> Any how. I have a feeling blacksmithing is broke. My skill is 126 or
somewhere near there. I can make all items with > only a few failures. (I
hate legs though, seem to fail a lot.) I have made well over 100 pieces of
armor over the past
> couple of weeks, and have not seen a single point of skill increase. I
didn't have any problem getting skill up to 126
> making all the standard stuff, then I start making armor, and I get
nothing. My Int is about average 86. I'm thinking
> that getting skill from making armor is broke. Has anyone else seen this?
Also, I know some armor items are trivial,
> and I know I'm not making a ton of trivial armor items. I've made plenty
of legs, mails, cloaks, mantles, etc.
>
> Any insight you folks can provide would be great.
>
> Also, why aren't there banded gloves. I have people asking me for these
all the time. Let's get those /feedback /bugs going and get some changes to
blacksmithing in the works.

> My Int is about average 86.
Below average for learning trade skills well. Mine is 138 and pitifully
low, but passable with loads of coin behind it. Get more INT to see more
increases.

> I'm thinking that getting skill from making armor is broke. Has anyone
else seen this?
Nope. In the few (12) pieces I've done in the recent week, I've gone from
125 to 128. I haven't seen much of a market for banded any longer with the
loads of twinked characters and spare cash laying around for bronze, plate,
and rubi, so stopped practicing for skill completely. The ONLY raises I get
now are from making, or not making, armor pieces.
